summary: New armors pack (22 armors and 11 hairs) from TERA Online
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/119947TESV20150104233625452.jpg[/img][/center]




[center][/center][center][youtube]fvjz4iPK2y8[/youtube][/center]

[center][youtube]aYkpeIuY4Xc[/youtube][/center]


[center][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/962056coollogocom13484830.png[/img][/center]Hello and welcome to my new mod.
I'm happy to share with you these new armors, that mod contains 12 aman armors, 11 aman hairs cuts, 5 castanic armors, 2 high elf armors and 3 human armors.

Let's see step by step the contents:

[b][color=gold]textures:[/color][/b]
2048x2048 sizes (not gloves), a lot armors  have a specular map.
Aman28 need a cubemap (no given with this mod) , i suggest to take the cubemap here for a better rendering:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37487/?]link[/url] (need only cube map)

[b][color=gold]meshes:[/color][/b]
All armors are high polygons, don't worry, they are not heavy for your computer.
You can find a CBBE version NOBBP/ HDT and a bodyslide mod (belly, boobs and butt support)

*FIRST UNP pack realised;
you can find 10 of 22 armors in UNP NOBBP version.



Aman:
[img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/888177aman4.jpg[/img]
Castanic:
[img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/623116casta2.jpg[/img]
High Elf:
[img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/383803elf2.png[/img]
Human:
[img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/685346human2.png[/img]
[center][/center]Aman hairs:
[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=637430Untitled10.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/thumbs/mini_637430Untitled10.jpg[/img][/url]




[center][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/624352coollogocom13485967.png[/img][/center][b][color=gold]Mod required:[/color][/b]
1. CBBE (only if you use CBBE version)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url]
2. UNP (only if you use UNP version)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
3. Bodyslide 2.0 (if you use bodyslide)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url]
4.HDT Physics Extensions (no required if you use only NOBBP)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions by HydrogensaysHDT[/url]
5. HDT Breast And Butt Physics (no required if you use only NOBBP)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59416/?]HDT Bounce and Jiggles by [b]Knightmare077[/b][/url]
6. HDT HighHeels System
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/url]

[b][color=gold]Installation for bodyslide:[/color][/b]
NEXUS installation:
just follow instructions given by your NEXUS manager.
[b][color=gold]Manual installation:[/color][/b]
Open the archive and go here:
"01 - TERA Pack 2015"
open and select everything and put all files here:
*:\* (x86)\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\Data

[b][color=gold]Installation for CBBE[/color][/b]:
NEXUS installation:
just follow instructions given by your NEXUS manager.
[b][color=gold]Manual installation:[/color][/b]
Open the archive and select all folders and put them  here;
*:\* (x86)\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\Data
Valid "Terapack2015.esp"







[center][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/947927coollogocom13484856.png[/img][/center][b][color=gold]Boots:[/color][/b]
All boots have high heels system, don't forget to install HDT HighHeels System (no HDT HighHeels System=crash)

[b][color=gold]UNP version:[/color][/b]
This is the list of UNP armors realised:
Aman:
H18/H19/H21/H25/H28/H30/KAIA
Castanic:
H30
High Elf:
H19
Human:
H25
For installation, you need main file and UNP file.
Others armors will be CBBE, waiting the next pack.

[b][color=gold]Crafting:[/color][/b]
All armors can be crafted in all forges.
You can find them, in Iron, Ebony, Dragon and Daedric categories.
These armors are not overpowered, if you need Daedric requierement, by exemple, that means your armor will have Daedric statistics.


[b][color=gold]Barrel test[/color][/b]
You can find a barrel test with all armors, with invit command:
console (tape "²") and "help "TERABARREL" with no ""
after:
[i]player.placeatme (ref of the barrel) 1[/i]
If you want disable the barrel:
console (tape "²") select the barrel and tape: "disable" with no""

[b][color=gold]Bodyslide:[/color][/b]
You can find 3 groups, 1 for CBBE NOBBP, 1 for HDT body (boobs, belly and butt) and 1 for gloves and boots).
Use them for a automatic installation.
All bodyslides have a shape cutted, i can't use a full shape.
The base of bodyslide is CBBE classic.
Never use these sliders if you don't want have some gaps:

For neck:
-big torso
-small seams

For wrists:
-arms
-chubby arms
-big torso
-small seams

For ancles:
-calfsmooth
-calf size
-knee height
-small seams
-ankles

[b][color=gold]Modders:[/color][/b]
If you want use my mod for new creations, contact me before, thanks.
*I look for modders for to help with havok system for capes and hairs for theses armors.

[b][color=gold]Thanks:[/color][/b]
I thank everybody for support.

[b][color=gold]Autorisation:[/color][/b]
